Displays bots help and command list.
{%P}{%command} [command or module name]
You can also use these switches:
-m - Displays only available modules, -m module - Displays commands from specified module, -a - Displays all commands, even if we have insufficient permissions to run it, -l - Additionally prints required access level.
-r regex - Matches command by given regex.

Manages command aliases in bot.
{%P}{%command} add alias command - adds new alias, {%P}{%command} remove alias - removes alias, {%P}{%command} command komenda - displays all aliases of specified command, {%P}{%command} - displays all aliases.

Menages user permissions in bot.
{%P}{%command} - Displays all permissions. {%P}{%command} "nick/jid" - Displays access level of specified user. {%P}{%command} "nick/jid" level - Sets users access level.
As a access level you can use every natural number from 0 to 10. You SHOULDN'T give ANYONE max access level (10).
